message: Let's be fair, Bob. I know the stakes, but this offer benefits us both.
My turn to propose something fair, Alice. This deal takes inflation into account.
The clock is ticking, Bob. This offer is even better for you than the last round. Don't let greed get the best of us.
Alice, let's be realistic. Time is money, and it's losing value fast. This is a good deal for both of us.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  Let's split it evenly and call it a day. Any more stalling and we both lose!
